name: anyware
0:
”Alexa, turn on adaptor_name”
”Alexa, turn off adaptor_name”
”Alexa, set the adaptor_name to 50%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control your Anyware Smart Adaptors™ using voice commands.

You can turn the lights ON/OFF and set the dimming level with simple voice commands specifying either your Smart Adaptor or a Room.

If you want to turn on all the lights in your living room, simply say “Alexa, turn on the living room lights.” 

If you want to dim a specific light (e.g. the floor lamp) to 40%, just say “Alexa, dim Floor Lamp to 40 percent”.

Please check out www.anyware.solutions for more information.
